metadata.title: CVE-2024-50107 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:platform/x86/intel/pmc: Fix pmc_core_iounmap to call iounmap for validaddressesCommit 50c6dbdfd16e ("x86/ioremap: Improve iounmap() address range checks")introduces a WARN when adrress ranges of iounmap are invalid.
